content.detailedDescription: Walking along the beach in rogers park n. chicago, overlooking lake michigan, i looked up to the sky. it was a cloudy day and not very many people were out. i saw what at first looked like two suns, and i thought at first that it was an eclipse. then i saw the less bright disc slowly descending. i spoke to a woman and asked if she saw it. she shrugged her shoulders and walked off. i spoke to a couple and we talked about it for a short time. then i left. i wish i had a camera with me. it was the most incredible thing i have seen. i should have reported it earlier.
content.summary: Walking along the beach i saw what looked like two suns.

content.detailedDescription: Walking along the beach in rogers park n. chicago, overlooking lake michigan, i looked up to the sky. it was a cloudy day and not very many people were out. i saw what at first looked like two suns, and i thought at first that it was an eclipse. then i saw the less bright disc slowly descending. i spoke to a woman and asked if she saw it. she shrugged her shoulders and walked off. i spoke to a couple and we talked about it for a short time. then i left. i wish i had a camera with me. it was the most incredible thing i have seen. i should have reported it earlier.
content.summary: Walking along the beach i saw what looked like two suns.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 2251 hrs on 5/09/10, i walked outside to let my dog out and as i always do i looked up to the night sky to see the stars. i noticed two small dots of light moving slowly from the the south to the north at a medium speed. both objects were directly in line with the other, i initially thought they might be low orbiting satalites but as i watched it appeared as if the second dot of light was being "towed" (for lack of a better word) by the first. the first dot of light would move, then a half second to second later the second dot of light would move. i turned around, went back inside to get my wife and turn off the patio light to see better. once we both were back outside i observed both objects make a gradiual left turn and start moving to the northeast and watched as i lost sight of them. i initially thought i lost sight of them due to the lighting conditions but now believe i lost sight due to them gaining in altitude. after losing sight of them i continued to watch the ne sky to see if i could observe anything else. after approx five minutes i noticed a bright star like object in the ne sky become brighter (like a shooting star bright) and move from the ne to the north in a short eratic movement then disappear. i continued watching the night sky for another 20-30 minutes but did not observe anything else. 

i live with in five miles of the huntsville/madison airport and 10 miles of redstone arsenal. i have never seen what i witness last night before, i am not saying it/they were alien ufo's, i am reporting what i observed to see if others reported the same or aid in additional investigations.
content.summary: I observed 2 star-like high flying objects move from south to north in a medium speed, then turn left towards the northeast. as i watched it appeared as if the second one was being towed by the first. i lost sight then saw bright flash

content.detailedDescription:
Mothers day, may 9, 2010 around 8:15 pm (salt lake city, utah)

it was a typical day, it was mothers day and me and my dad celebrated with my mom having a bbq in our backyard. so at 8:00 ironically a program came on the bio channel called "alien cover-up" it that show talked about ufo research cover-up in locations of nevada and utah. well i normally don't follow the ufo stuff as much as i used to because it is all about stories and lights in the skies. i always was a believer but i never thought that i would see something. so we went outside to check on the bbq since it was almost ready.

i looked up above in the sky, which our neighbors garage is in front and above it i noticed a pitched black object. the object was above seen about 100 feet away, about a block down from my street. at first i thought it was a hang glider because it appeared to shaped like one, then i thought it was that airplane and i was expecting a banner or something to promote the salt lake bees or something. 

i asked my dad "what is that?" 

he said "what is what?"

i said "what is that?"

"where" he said.

i said "right there"

and he said "oh"

i joked and said "it made no sound" (referring to what other people reported when they see ufos) this thing didn't make a sound as well.

"what is that?" 

"a balloon?"

"is that a kite?"

"a bird"

"a drone of some kind? what is that?"

it was changing shape as it was slowly above my neighborhood. it was changing shapes. it appeared to be a kite and then it looked liked a hang glider then when it was approaching a corner heading west at an angle i saw wings or spiky points in the back and it was like it was shape shifting. it was changing shapes as it was moving.

then it started moving west in an angle. i took a picture of it twice with my camera phone and i freaked out because it didn't appear on my camera. (but after looking at my pictures expanded and inverted from the paint program is appears as a round orbed object. however this is not what i see with my eyes.)

so it was there at the corner of my house on the east side heading towards west in an angle. i ran in front of my driveway looking up to see where it went and i couldn't see through the trees then my dad was next to me and i told him to get the car.

i looked and it was already down south from where i lived. block down in seconds. that is when i saw my dad and i ran down and we got in the car and we were talking about it and i told him "it is going down.", then my mom came out and was confused and my dad gestured with his finger for her to come in the car. 

my mom asked "what is going on?"

i looked over at her and i said "mom, i saw a f_____ ufo." 

so i told my dad "hurry", "hurry", "hurry" and he said "i am going" "i am going"

he then asked "where is it?"

i said "it is right there, you see it?"

he said "yeah i see it." 

i asked my mom if she seen it and she said "it looks like a bird, but it isn't"

so we start heading west. i was on the passengers still looking at it making sure it doesn't lose my site. so then we turn and head south.

i was still searching for it and i seen it off and on and it appeared to all the sudden it was heading east. it appeared to be a little higher than it previously was when it was by my house. but it was far. i was at foothill drive during this event and it was far down between state street and 3rd west and around 33rd south, as i was able to spot it again. it looked like a star shaped figure now. it was strange. it was just there floating and hovering there. 

we went down 23rd south westbound and took the sugar house exit as it was floating above that area. it eventually went to 15th east and 33rd south. so we head back up towards east millcreek. i was upset because i saw the object change direction. it stopped after heading east and i saw it and i felt like it knew that we were following it somehow and it went down west towards east millcreek. from there i lost it for a bit because it blended well with the mountains. i thought that we were not going to see it again, until i spot it again at east millcreek at the smith's marketplace.

we got out and observed it some more. when i spotted it during our journey of following it, at times it appeared to have wings of some kind and the weird part of it was when it ascended straight up it did a loop and it appeared to have wings like the nazca condor. it had that wing span stretched. this object was too big to be a bird, it never flaps its wings and it was shape shifting.

as it was ascending higher and higher into the sky i saw a lightning bolt that was faded appeared close to it. the weather was windy however the dark clouds were approaching from the southwest. i don't believe that it was a balloon on how fast it went in a matter of seconds, how it was changing shape, how it looked like a spaceship of some kind. it was ascending higher and higher until i couldn't see it with my eyes it went so high that it blurred with the sky.

when it was ascending up a black jet appeared going south east from where the object was. it was bizarre because i never seen that fighter plane before. my dad said it looked like an ov-10 but he wasn't sure and told me to look it up. the plane that flew by it had a two contrails coming out of it, so from that evidence alone it had two engines and he said it might of been on ov-10 because of how slow it was. however, it did seem like a reconnaissance aircraft of some kind.

i had to concentrate on the ufo, because i seen planes before.

the object seemed to be out of reach for that plane anyways as the airplane kept flying down south east. it came out of nowhere and coincidently towards the area of the ufo that i seen.

it was also doing some weird movements as it ascended up, it was going left and right up and spiraling it's way up. it was bizarre and i am pretty sure that i saw it extend it's wings as it was doing this it looked exactly like that nazca condor from the nazca lines. the best way i can describe it it was extending out like a cross like figure.

i saw something that i cannot explain. i labeled it as a flying humanoid as well because of the pattern it moved and the shape shifting that it was doing. since i seen videos of these "flying humanoids" shape shifting. but this was a little different at the same time, since it appeared to have spiked wings of some kind.

i am really hoping that what i saw can be explainable. i am actually hoping that i did not see an alien craft of some kind. i am hoping someone out there saw what i saw over salt lake city and i am hoping someone can tell me it was nothing. however, from what i experienced it was too weird to be anything from this earth.

in respect to the questions this report requires me to point out i will recap below: 

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
in my backyard with my dad cooking bbq. 

2. what made you first notice the object?

i always look up, but i had a feeling that something was towards that area so i looked and there it appeared.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

a hang glider, a parachutist, a bird, a kite and a airplane.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.

it was slow then it was fast. it appeared to be a constant speed kind of like floating and hovering. the object was triangle shaped when it started off and it was flying weird directions, it was shape shifting where it looked like a bird like the nazca bird. it was weird. the spiked wings was changing directions and shapes. the object was also pitched black and changed into a star shaped figure at times.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

the atmosphere did seem different. it is this uplifting feeling when i saw it really. my eyes were watery and i took this seriously. i was shocked and i was amazed and terrified at the same. i never took my eye of it and i was determine to keep staring at it until it disappeared from my eyes.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

it went so high that it blurred from my vision and a storm came in covering over the spot that i seen it at.


i have two pictures. i circled the object in black as it appears as an orb. this is not what i seen with my own eyes. the phone on my camera was the only thing that i have. i am upset that i don't have any other camera or video camera of this object. but i thought that i had no evidence. the quality sucks because you can almost barely see the object. if you notice that it appears and stands out against anything around it in the sky. if you invert the color in the paint program it looks more clearly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Mothers day ufo/humanoid/nazca condor? unlike anything that i have ever seen before.

content.detailedDescription: I went with bubby to take his youger brother out for trick or treat.I looked up at cloudy firmament and saw a silver tinted disk slice down through the clouds then back up through the clouds again.Being i was 13 at the time i thought that i did not care if any one thought i was nuts or not.I saw a ufo and thats it.
content.summary: Large silver tinted thin disc

content.detailedDescription:
That was truly a life changing event, i'm speechless! 6 spheres, or 1 craft just flew right over for everyone in los angeles to see. you just had to be looking up to the south to see the most amazing thing! i've always been a skeptic until tonight. i'm still spooked as i'm writing this. it passed thru my line of sight for at least 5 seconds, no aound, no [cms/tg/pd] sound. there was a plane heading southwest, thats what originally caught my eye. and then heading from my left to right, 6 lights appeared in a triangle formation, i said holy [cms/tg/pd], as it gracefully crossed my line of sight, i noticed the spheres were opaque, beige tinted kinda like the color of the moon through clouds! (there is not a cloud in the sky tonight) as it passed and started to fade it almost appeared to rotate or tumble, and then was gone flying south! oh my god, oh my god, oh my god! somebody else had to see this. it flew right over los angeles, and was definitely visible long enough to be filmed. i stared into the sky, motionless, mouth dry from a dropped jaw for ten minutes, tingling with chicken skin from head to toe. i contemplated what i saw, and i remember automatically thinking that we are not alone, and i saw proof of it tonight! that was not manmade, it was [cms/tg/pd] cruisin man. theres no way that i can judge how far away it was, but in contrast to the plane moving like a slug at altitude, this thing was agile and silent. i also remember waiting for the sound wave that shouldve followed, and there was nothing, the light rumble of a plane at nearby lax is all i heard! i lost sight of it in the distance! the hairs on the back of my neck are still standing! someone else had to see this, i'm not [cms/tg/pd] crazy! i dont see things. my life is forever changed!

replyreply allmove...
content.summary: Tight chevron of 5 opaque round lights

content.detailedDescription:
Note: i took this report by phone this morning may 10, 2010 by a man who said he lived in the county near platte city. he wishes to remain anonymous. i asked him to keep in touch with me and if he remembered anything else to give me a call.  i named him john doe because he did not want to give his name out, saying that his job would be in jeapordy if word got out.  i assured him that all information would be kept confidential, but he said he couldn't take the risk. margie kay

report: 

the man stated that he went outside to tend to his dogs at approximately 9:15 pm when a light in the northwest part of his pasture where he keeps cows caught his eye. he said that there was a beam of light coming down from a black triangular object.  it looked like the depth from top to bottom was approximately 50 feet or so, the sides were very even and squared. there were three small white lights, one on each corner of the object, and one big white/blue light in the center.  the object was approximately 300 yards from his position and looked like it was at least 100 yards in width from corner to corner.  after he watched it for about 5-10 minutes, the beam of light went out and the craft moved upward into the clouds until he could no longer see it clearly.  the ufo then moved in a southwest direction very slowly, and just above the clouds.  he stated that there was no sound whatsoever. he could see the lights on the ufo as it moved through the clouds.  he stated that he was too paralyzed to move and go get a camera, but he thought that it would be too dark to get a picture anyway.  he has never seen anything like this before.  i asked him if he had gone to look at the area where he saw the light beaming down on his field and he said no, but he would sometime this week.  he seemed somewhat afraid to go look at it.  his wife was inside the house at the time and he has not told her about this, but wanted to tell someone what he saw. i also asked him to send me a sketch.
content.summary: Large triangular ufo flying southeast

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, my wife and kids were fishing at our house when my 2 yr old pointed at a passenger jet flying over head.  i looked up and watched the jet cross the sky when an extremely bright object caught my eye.  the sky was clear, bright blue sky around 5:00pm.  this object was shiny silver, long cigar shaped and just sat there in the sky.  i pointed to it to show my kids, 7yrs, 5yrs, and 2yrs.  they all looked at it, my wife didn't want to admit she saw it, she thinkgs i'm crazy to want to see a ufo.  but clear as day, this thing just hovered in one spot, not moving at all, and i know it couldn't have been any kind of balloon.  i talked to it and said,"come on, come down here..", " i see you up there", and when i said that it seemed to get brighter, then floated off to the northwest.  it never went up or down, but stayed at the same level so it couldn't have been balloons.  plus it was extremely bright for something in the sky during the day.  i hope someone else saw it in my area.
content.summary: I saw extremely bright cigar shape hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: Heading south on us 19 myself and another passenger saw an extreemly fast streak of pulsating greenish to bright white light.It was in the south southwest direction and positioned near the dunedin area of pinellas co.
content.summary: Streak

content.detailedDescription: I looked out into the night and saw  a light in the horizon that emittted a white light with some blue and some red.It hovered in one location and was very still for about 15 to 20 minutes. then it started moving slowly offshore at what appearedto be the same altitude before turning and receding into the distance.
content.summary: A light out in the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work in mid-august 2001 when i pulled into our subdivision at approximately 5:30pm. it was a relatively clear day and as i drove slowly down this road (20mph speed limit in our neighborhood) my attention was drawn to the horizon just over the tree-line at the end of the street, probably about 1/8 mile in front of me.  i noticed what i thought was a small plane moving across the sky west-to-east (left-to-right).  what immediately jumped out at me was how low the plane was flying along with the blue-red glow that at this distance seemed to envelope the object.  my first thought was that it was a low-flying plane so i rolled down my window but there was no discernible engine noise.  as i got a little closer i expected that whatever it was would become more obvious but the only thing that changed was that the blue-red color seemed to be emanating (sp) from the bottom of the object. i kept trying to make out wings or tail with no luck.  at this point i was approaching the end of the street and the first of two quick right-turns.  as i took the first right turn the object seemed to be picking up speed and disappeared on the other side of some trees. the second right turn about 6 houses down got me out from under the trees and while the object was still viewable, it had definitely sped up and was almost out of sight, still heading east-northeast and still hugging the top of the trees.  after a couple of seconds it was gone.  i pulled into my driveway about 15 seconds later and rushed inside to tell my wife what i had just seen. as i stood in our dining room trying to explain this, i heard what sounded like a helicopter flying extremely low over my home.  i immediately went out the front door, looked up and there were two black helicopters flying unusually low over our subdivision, heading in the same direction as the object.  the time between my sighting and the black helicopters passing over our home was maybe 2-3 minutes.  i'd never seen anything like this before and wasn't sure who to call so i contacted the local police dept.  i gave the dispatcher the description of the events of the last 10 minutes including the two black choppers that had passed overhead, almost as if they were tailing this object.  she was polite but had not had any other calls and didn't have much to offer.
content.summary: Low-flying multi-colored object, followed by two black helicopters

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog after returning home from work and noticed a reddish orange object in the sky. the object appeared to be about 2000 ft off the ground, above me at a slight angle. it was close enough for me to see the "cockpit". this is what was emitting the light. i could see what appeared to be a normal fighter pilot, looking out his cockpit at me and my dog. the instruments were illuminating him, but you could not see the rest of the aircraft. the aircraft made no sound, moved forward very slowly, almost hovering. after about 20 seconds of the pilot "looking at me" , the craft lifted straight up and into the cloud cover at approx. 5000 ft. the craft never made a sound, but the area where the rest of the aircraft would be was "see-through" but hazy.
content.summary: Aircraft with light deflection technology

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving canora sask. to drive to yorkton, sask.Approx. 9:00 pm. my wife asks me why i am driveing this way, not my normal route. the next thing i remember is it is morning, aprox.8:00 am. we are sitting in our car. it is parked on a gravel road next to a farmers field.Car is off, keys in the ignition. it was like i just woke up. i looked at my wife and said we should get going. i wasn t aware of anything wrong. didn t feel paniced or abnormal.I looked in the field and there was a cylinder shaped object laying on its side, not touching the ground, just above the wheat field. it was like a chrome silver, smooth, as in no seems, rivets or anything on the exterior.It had a round pointy end on both sides. it looked like chrome but there was no reflection in it.I commented.What's that.My wife replied a grain bin.I replied ,how is it laying there not touching the ground? my wife says it must have legs.I look at this object. no legs, no noise, i could actually see air space between the bottom of the cylinder and the top of the crop. the object was about 60-70ft long by 20ft in diameter. it was about 100 ft from the road .My wife says go and take a look at it.I get this uneasy feeling and have this desire to get the hell out of here. i drive to yorkton, sask. arrive at the grandmothers house. she meets us at the door and says, you guys stay in a hotel? we don't reply back.. where were you guys last night?..We don t reply back.I heard her questions but my mind went blank for a responce.It did not sink in to me that i was away all night. that i left at 9:00 pm the night before and just arriveing now. the grandma says theres something wrong..We are acting funny.I have no reply, don t feel anything is wrong or abnormal. as i type this my heart is raceing.I'm laying in bed watching tv. my head feels hot. diane arrives after awhile. it was her house in canora that we left the night before. she starts asking us if we got a hotel.No reply to her,she asks if we were doing drugs or something...No reply from me.Diane goes and talks to her niece, my wife. i don t know what happened but diane is upset that we didn t contact anyone and we aren 't saying anything. i don t feel as if anything is wrong and do not realize that there has been a time loss that i can t account for. the subject gets dropped and we go on as usual. i have never ever brought this up with my wife, or diane,or the grandma. but i distinctly remember this as stated.It is approx. 15 years after the incident happened that i am now talking about it.
content.summary: Timeloss 9:00 pm to 8:00 am next day.

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:30 pm this evening i looked up and noticed a white light "blink" on an off. at first i didn't think much of it and i continued my star gazing. then i noticed the same blinking light in the exact same place about a minute or so later.  i've seen satalites, the i.S.S. etc passing over and i've even noticed occasional "flashes" of light from these which i assume is related to the rotation of mirrors or something catching the sun's rays.  this incident is different.  i continued to watch the light blink on and off every minute or a bit longer continually for an hour, and always in the same spot in the clear nite sky.  i imagine it's still doing so even as i write this.  can you tell me if there is any type of natural or man made phenominon that can occur in this fashion?  it's got me curious as all get out!
content.summary: Stationary blinking light blinking at regular intervals.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife called me out to our back porch to look at an object that looked like a star, but was moving back and forth.  at times it appeared like two lights very close together that were circling around each other, such that they appeared to be moving side to side (about the one measure of the object's width in either direction.  at other times, it appeared more like one light that was moving very quickly, though not a very great distance.  

this sighting was in the western sky nearly due west (89 deg west of north) from the i-40/san mateo blvd in albuquerque, nm, us (35deg,9min,10.35in north/106deg,35min,10.35in west) about 30 degrees above the horizon.

after about 20 minutes, i went to the street in front of our house and found a star that appeared to be in the same general location in the sky, however it did not exhibit any unusual behavior as what i observed from our backyard.

it's been a while since seeing this object, and when i reach back to grasp any feelings, i can only recall a sense of playfulness and maybe innocent mischievousness.
content.summary: Looked like star dancing right and left

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home from doctors appt. in portage,wis.. traveling north on hwy. 16. right outside of the town area limits i noticed something odd in the sky. it was a beautiful sunny and partly cloudy day. taking furter notice of this huge cloud like item. more and more it looked just like a huge disc shape ufo. i noticed what looked like a top and a bottom ring band around its center section. proceeding around it. then i realised that inbetween these bands looked somewhat to be windows. going all around  and each seemed to be separated. looked as if it was the same type of metal that those rings around the center were constructed from.It also had a top and bottom to the shape of half a ball.

keeping my eye on it, i wanted to see if it was moving. if it was, it was moving at an awful slow speed. but more i drove the larger it seemed to become. that is when i came to the conclusion; i was only getting closer to it and not moving as i first thought. more i drove, closer and larger the ufo became. 

unfortunately i had forgot to grab my camera bag. before leaving home. could kick myself.For i know better--that's exactly when such things happen. i am drawing a picture of how it looked as i seen it.

highway 16 leads straight into hwy. 13. upon coming up to hwy. 82 in adams county, which crosses a bridge over to juenea county in wis.. i could see that this humonguos ufo craft or mother ship was stationary. directly between these two counties. hovering over the wisconsin river and just south of the hwy. 82 bridge of adams, county. totally flabber gastic over exactly just how huge this thing was. numerous and i mean numerous football fields could have fitting inside this ufo.

time i got home and grabbed my camera in hope--it was gone.
now i think that perhaps i should have pulled off the hwy. and stood outside looking up. maybe then others would have taken the same clue. perhaps someone with even a camera phone. i was just in aw--to its size.


would you be interested in my drawing? had you recieved any other reports of this same sighting?

thank you for your time.
sincerely, [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Huge-disc shape ufo w/ windows all around,center. encased w/ clouds

content.detailedDescription: I'm in clackamas county, oregon, near deep creek - sandy/boring. last night, it was really clear and cool, so i went out on my deck to get some fresh air. i looked up, and within a couple of seconds, an aircraft came into view from over my roof and treetops. it came directly along the small canyon/creek bed where i live, nw to se, at approximately 11:10 pm. it was not flying along the high altitude, commercial flight paths, and it was much lower in altitude, though not as low, as small, private aircraft that buzz this area. i couldn't estimate the size, nor did i see a body shape. what i did see were two deep orange wing-tip lights where the red port and green starboard lights should have been. they were steady, no strobing. there was a center, red light which strobed. there was jet engine noise. the aircraft was moving very rapidly, and disappeared into the trees, and the sound diminished immediately, which was interesting, as everything in this canyon echoes, and military jets, on training flights, can be heard both before they are seen and after, for a long period of time. i thought it was a jet aircraft, due to the sound, but the lights were totally wrong. i tried to follow it visually, but the trees blocked my view. it was visible for probably no more than 20 seconds, and it took me about three of those to realize what was wrong with the picture. no drinking or drugs involved. no real emotional reaction, just curiosity and a bit of excitement at seeing an unknown.
content.summary: Aircraft with orange wingtip lights, red center strobe

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car wreck and had been in the hospital for seven days i had three compression fractures in my back needless to say i had been on alot of pain killers but i had gotton out that day and was sent home to heal so my ex wife took me home (we were married then ) me and my wife were in the bed sleeping when i just woke up there was a bed room window across from me and i looked and seen these three lights they were very big they wern't collision lights these were like event lights huge and they were directly over my brothers house just hovering silently no niose what so ever so i thought i was dreaming so i woke my wife up and asked her am i dreaming or do you see these lights to and she said she saw them too so i kinda was numb from the pain killers and i remeber just looking at these lights for as long as possible the next thing we knew was we were waking up in the morning and the first thing i asked her was did that really happen or was it a dream and she said it happened and did not remember falling back to sleep either ,the next day it was all over the news and i asked my brother if he knew anything he said his house was vibrating but he thought he was dreaming he lives 600 to 900 yards from me i seen my ex a while back and asked her if she still remembered what happened she does, it was the most amazing thing i've ever saw in my entire life i just wonder what happened after they put us to sleep , added note , my right arm was paralyzed from the wreck and the doctor said it was permenant and would never return three months later i could move it and has returned 100% kinda makes me wonder if they did something to me the reason i am writing this is because i just saw the fourth kind and when that ship went over her house i got goose bumps and felt like that may have happened to me but i dont want to know if it did ,let me rephrase that don't know if anyone could find out if it did , but since your keeping a record i felt i needed to tell you , i am 46 years old now and to this day that memory stands out in my mind like it happened yesterday ,
content.summary: It was triangle in shape with 3 lights one at the top and one on each side like a pyrimid

content.detailedDescription: In marquette, mi., may 06, 2010 approximately 9 pm i went outside into my yard to smoke a cigarette.  the evening sky was cloudy. stars couldn't be seen. i noticed a very bright light through the trees and it could only be seen by standing in the "sweet spot".  initially, i thought it was the moon but quickly realized it was not. i moved around the yard trying to get a better view without success. moments later the light seemed to burn out. i checked local news for reports as there had been a handful of daytime sightings of a craft days earlier.  no comments.  may 08, 2010 at approximately 11:15 pm i was outside smoking and looked up into a very clear night sky to see a brilliantly white light moving silently across the sky.  i am under commercial airline traffic so was dilligent to see what type of craft could be lit up in such a way. i live approximately a mile away from the lake superior shoreline.  i watched this very bright, large object move overhead and east toward the lake where it appeared to launch into hyperspace. but really, what i saw was the object get smaller and disappear.  what i saw was that this ufo began to ascend at  45 degrees and zoom away out of sight.  yet, the craft got smaller not as a function of it's ascent or distance but more like, i know this sounds crazy, but like it was being vaccuumed or sucked into some unseen tube.  this ufo was huge and silent!  a couple of seconds afterward a commercial craft flew over and i could hear it perfectly and in comparrison of the lights, ...They were visable but pinhead.
content.summary: Large, bright white light moving silently across sky at night.

content.detailedDescription: On may 4th,2010 at 9:00pm,me and a fellow worker came out back of our grocery store that sits on the ocean to smoke a cig,when we noticed an extremely bright diamond shape light at low altitude,way to bright to be a star or aircraft,it just sat there for about 30 minutes,but i had to go back in the store to go to work and asked my fellow employee to let me know if it moved,about 15 minutes later he told me it was gone.We then went back outside to look for it and saw it sitting over the ridge top going off and coming back on for 1 hour and a half.When it would go off a dim red glow was visible,but it never moved,it was the whitest light we had ever seen,we went home around midnight, we both feel certain this was a ufo.
content.summary: Diamond shaped white light over the ocean then over ridge top where it sat and went off and on for hours

Saw a star like flash. very brillant and brith with lines coming out of it all around it. went into itself glowing still then dissapeared. event happene again with only husband watching then again with both of us watching. and a jet flying very low like i

content.detailedDescription:
I went to mt.Namsan in seoul.
my boyfriend took a picture.
after i came back to home and check the picture, i saw a little black spot on the right side of picture.

my digital camera model name is samsung vluu pl50.
attached image is original.
i want to know that spot is ufo or not.
content.summary: Just still cut

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on i-39 near edgerton, wi and was taking a sequence of photos of an unusual looking cloud forming and later when i looked at the photos i noticed a white rod flying through one of the frames. (2nd photo) i've attached the before and after photos as well. nothing real exciting but it's another piece of the puzzle.
content.summary: Flying rod captured in sequence of photographs.

content.detailedDescription: I'm trying to figure out how to remain calm as i am recall these events. first the photo of what appears to be a sillouette of a dome shaped craft hovering near the clouds in downtown kansas city missouri. next an oval shaped craft flying through cloud cover during a severe storm which looked intentional. a star shaped craft near the clouds that had a perfect star shape with five points.  while riding home from work noticing a object approximately 8 to 10 feet long seemingly float through the air rotating and pointing up in the air lengthwise. moving slowly about 5-15 mph northward. tried to turn around and follow craft, but it dissapeared. searched for several blocks but could not relocate. that brings me to 2 days ago. since the first sighting i have really been watching the skys lately.  and what i've found out is that if your'e not careful, you'll find what you're looking for. two day ago i got the wise idea to go out and stand in the front yard and observe the sky.  well i didn't have to wait long or look very far. it wa about 22:45 hrs.It came from a southeasterly direction. a ball or sphere glowing white. not a bright white but a luminescent glow about two to three hundred feet above my head movin in a straight line at about thirty to forty mph, as it came over the top of me it paused glowed brighter and then continued on its way. less than two minutes later another craft with the same approximate description was moving in the exact opposite direction also glowing. it however did not pause or increase in intensity. it never increased it's speed and flew out of sight. i could not believe my eyes. i couldn't and still can't understand why i was given an opportunity to see these things. and finally when i looked to the north after the second craft had left the area i noticed another craft toward the north with two light one red, and the other white which stayed on only a couple of minutes and appeared to be strobeing or pulsing. it seemed to just sat there in the northern sky until i got up the nerve to raise my hand to give the appearance that i was trying to say hello a few seconds later a extremely bright light came on, flashed and then were off again. i am becomming a bit concerned. after wittnessing this last event i went into my home and woke my wife and told her the details of what had just happened. it felt a bit like close encounters when i told her and she gave me a look as if to say you're crazy, come back to bed! i never realized that by seeing these things one is opening him or herself up to a lot of scrutiny by friends,family, and even strangers alike. so mufon representatives please! please! do your best. don't do it thinking your'e going to help push ur toward a new era of technology. do it to help all of us to understand these beings and why they're here. something i noticed most of these crafts were seen while looking toward the sun.  other during severe storms and now i think that they are becomming bolder and allowing themselves to be seen in full daylight. why because most humans don't really pay close attention to events in the sky unless spectacular. i don't know if these crafts are that far advanced, but they sure look like it. perhaps thousands if not millions of years ahead of us. so good luck and be careful. they don't seem to think that we pose a threat to them. i wish i could say the same.
content.summary: I have been noticing some really strange flight patterns and crafts.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching sky as i have been since my first sighting two weeks ago. orange/red object appeared traveling south to north at meteor speed, i thought at first it was a meteor until it made a 45 degree turn. it traveled perhaps 5 mile then vanished. it's just my speculation but i think it went up and out into space. ive been seeing several object's nightly this is the first one i've saw making this kind of speed.
content.summary: Meteor like speed

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee first noticed the light when she looked out the window after some love-making. she thought that it was a star and asked me if she was crazy or was the star moving. she said that it seemed too bright for a star and that it had a blue light which was moving from top to bottom of the object.

the first thing that came to my mind was a star. i couldn't focus on it at first and didn't see the same blue light. to me it looked like a star until we noticed that it was moving from side to side and up and down. 

then i noticed that it seemed to be shining a light at the clouds as if searching for something.

both of us were kind of freaked, not being sure if it might be a u.F.O. or if we were just imagining things.

after a few seconds of the light scanning the clouds, whatever it was just disappeared and we didn't see it again. were sure the clouds didn't obscure it because they were too sparse and it never fully drifted behind the clouds before disappearing.
content.summary: Looked like a star, but had lights that moved from top to bottom. had a light shining towards clouds

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, may 2, 2010 at approximately 9:40 p.M. my husband and i were on our way back to our home in southwest austin.  while driving down latta rd. we both noticed two bright amber lights in the night sky.  the lights appeared to be around 4-5 blocks in distance from each other.  the lights moved in unision as if they were attached beneath an object.  my husband stopped the car and we both stepped out to get a better look.  the object and the lights continued to glide northward in the sky.  the object seemed to be about 300 ft. from the ground and floated noiselessly.  the space behind the object was dark and you could not see the night sky behind it. another car came up behind us so we jumped back in the car and turned back to follow the object but soon lost sight of it.  the object did not bear usual markings of explained aircraft.
content.summary: Amber lights in night sky over austin, texas

content.detailedDescription: I was in the 7th grade. i was outside on a sunday evening-about to 'head into the house' to watch tv. we lived in suburban connecticut, bordered by hundreds of acres of land owned by the bridgeport hydraulic company- there was a large reservoir  which i believe was one of the reservoirs supplying water for the greater brideport area. i was enjoying the night sounds and the cool weather once the sun had set. i noticed something in the sky and looked up to see a very large silent disc (with no lights) moving slowly across the sky not too far above our colonial 2 story home. i watched it for a few seconds and then began to call very loudly for my sister or my grandmother (who was babysitting my 4 younger brothers and sisters) that evening to 'hurry up and come outside to 'see somehing.' i kept looking up at the sky when this huge disc moved slowly and silently over our house. by the time my grandmother came out of the house (annoyed at my yelling) it was too late-the disc had passed and was 'heading' toward the area where the reservoir was located (i would often take a walk through the woods down there a lot and it seemed like the direction it was going) i have never seen anything else like this and i am now 55 years old. i have never forgotten this image and i often remember the event and am so curious about it...I remember it like it was yesterday although it occurred over 40 years ago!
content.summary: Large disc shaped dark/no lights/silent/moving over home

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time and my girlfriend and i were traveling from turnpike(95) on rt. 9 towards my mothers house just north of myrtle beach, sc.

we both saw around object with red, blue, white, etc. lights going around object. it then lifted up and zoomed west without a sound. i didn't stop to investigate but know what i saw was not public technology. i have told friends up to this point but figured it is time to record the incident. not first time seeing other worldly crafts either. ben
content.summary: Ufo sighted behind house in field off rt.9 between 95 and rt.17 myrtle beach.

content.detailedDescription:
To a degree i find this humorus.  for the last three years in the summer i have sat on the balcony of my apt. at night and viewed ufo's on a regular basis.  i am facing north, my view to the south is blocked.  hwy 83 is on my right and i define my viewing area by hwy 355 to the west.  i call it the funnel or corridor.  i have seen mundane ufo's zipping thru the skies and some amazing sitings.  one such siting last summer was an object moving from the east to the west and passed right in front of me.  the object was relatively low in the sky and was shaped like a cone.  it was brilliant and appeared to have rectangular panels but edges were not decernable.  the light coming from it was like light refracted from a prism or off the surface of a diamond.  amazed that the next day there was nothing in the news.  i have seen objects change directions between 45-90*.  i have seen one huge object that was outlined and milky white.  in the brief time i saw it another smaller ufo crossed underneath it and was backshadowed as it crossed along the diameter of the larger craft.  the real observation is the pattern of objects coming in from the south in the "funnel" to north in the distance and actually decending.  the time frame is usually 20:00 hrs to 21:30 hrs.  the number is 2-3 in most observations.  if i take a leap here they are landing and from a map the only place i can see where they can do this with some obscurity is busse woods.  i have tried to follow them down as far as i can and when possible i employ a 10x50 nikon binocular.  
if you want to really document ufo's in the skys over chicago just use a time lapse camera at night.  you can't miss.  there are nights i don't spot anything but over time it is enescapable.  i have other accounts but this will do for now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighting was at twilight in skies over the area
